item.description:
Join the Maine State Director of The Humane Society of the United States and other animal advocates to discuss current issues affecting animals.

The Humane Society is working on several projects to improve life for Maine's animals, and we can't be effective without your help. If you are concerned about puppy mills, wildlife abuses, local animal issues, or just generally creating a more compassionate Maine, you should attend this informative and motivational meeting to learn how you can take action for animals.

Even if you have attended one of our grassroots meetings in the past, join us again to refresh your skills and meet other local animal advocates. Remember to bring your passion for animals, and donâ€™t forget to invite your friends.

RSVP today to lend your voice for animals and make a difference in Maine. Hope to see you there!

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Belfast Grassroots Animal Welfare Meet-Up
